column4: silly question - I want to upgrade firefox beta 3 r 5 to the new release candidate 3rc2 how would i do so seamlessly?
if you have updates enable you should have rc1 available, for rc2 you will need to do a manual install
do i have to remove the previous one?
no you do not, if you install it to a difference place, but please search for a web page with instructions, is not something easy for beginners
